/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Trees are interspersed between the buildings, adding a touch of green to the concrete jungle. The street itself is busy with cars and buses, indicating a well-used transportation route. Traffic lights and street signs punctuate the scene, guiding the flow of vehicles. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being enveloped by the cityscape.
